NAME
  osmo-auc-gen - GSM/GPRS/3G authentication testing tool


SYNOPSIS
  osmo-auc-gen [options]



OPTIONS

 -2,--2g         Use 2G (GSM) authentication
 -3,--3g         Use 3G (UMTS) authentication
 -a,--algorithm  Specify name of the algorithm
 -k,--key        Specify Ki / K
 -o,--opc        Specify OPC (only for 3G)
 -O,--op         Specify OP (only for 3G)
 -f,--amf        Specify AMF (only for 3G)
 -s,--sqn        Specify SQN (only for 3G)
 -A,--auts       Specify AUTS (only for 3G)
 -r,--rand       Specify random value
 -I,--ipsec      Output in triplets.dat format for strongswan




AUTHOR
  This manual page was written by Ruben Undheim <ruben.undheim@gmail.com> for the Debian project (and may be used by others).
